sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-toolbar dark color="#333" class="header">
      <v-container fluid fill-height>
        <v-row justify="center" align="center" class="fill-height">
          <v-col cols="12" sm="10" md="8" lg="6" xl="4">
            <v-slide-y-transition>
              <v-card class="pa-4" :class="headerCardClass">
                <v-card-title class="white--text title">
                  Farming and Crop Delivery
                </v-card-title>
                <v-card-text class="white--text description">
                  Exploring the world of agriculture and direct-to-consumer crop delivery
                </v-card-text>
              </v-card>
            </v-slide-y-transition>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-toolbar>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import {
  VApp,
  VContainer,
  VRow,
  VCol,
  VCard,
  VCardTitle,
  VCardText,
  VSlideYTransition
} from 'vuetify';

export default {
  name: 'AppHeaderSection',
  components: {
    VApp,
    VContainer,
    VRow,
    VCol,
    VCard,
    VCardTitle,
    VCardText,
    VSlideYTransition
  },
  computed: {
    headerCardClass() {
      if (this.$vuetify) {
        return {
          title: true,
          description: true,
        };
      }
      return {};
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style>
/* Your styles */
.header {
  background-color: #333;
  color: #fff;
  padding: 16px 0;
  text-align: center;
  height: 100vh; /* Make header full screen */
}

.title {
  font-size: 4rem; /* Increase font size for larger screens */
}

.description {
  font-size: 1.5rem; /* Adjust description font size */
}

@media screen and (max-width: 960px) {
  .title {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }

  .description {
    font-size: 1.2rem;
  }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {
  .title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }

  .description {
    font-size: 1rem;
  }
}
</style>
